thread.section_title: Hotel de la Perdrix Rouge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel
thread.title_full: Nice hotel - Review of Hotel de la Perdrix Rouge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dyuzhakova
title: Nice hotel
text: We stayed at that hotel for 6 nights. Our room was on the 5th floor with a great view to the cathedral. The wifi worked very well. As we arrived at the beginning of March we were afraid that it could be cold in a room, but the heating was working very well so it was warm and comfortable. The room was cleaned and the towels were changed every day. There is a safe and minibar in a room. The hotel is in an area which is very local, calm and safe. We loved that nice hotel and would like to come back again.
